title: tzegian
author: tzegian
content: Crypto Analogy is here to assist you in finding the key coin stats, having the best coin tracker containing thousands of coins like Bitcoin, Ethereum and every other cryptocurrency, discovering various market stats and exploring the most important crypto news.Our coin tracker is one of a kind, containing the most important coin stats for a quick research along with the feature to create your own one by adding your favorite coins in a separate list. But not only that, it is highly customizable as you can select the coin stats you want to be displayed or switch between a compact coin tracker and a more detailed one.As thousands of coins are included, you are able to select any of those to find the most complete stats for any coin where you will be able to explore and find out the key stats of any crypto.Search and compare between any cryptocurrency or use the advanced coin tools and you will be able to find the true potential of any cryptocurrency. Setting a custom amount for the coin price is also possible.You can compare your own crypto against any other or against a custom market cap and custom circulating supply in order to figure out how how high your investments/portfolio on any cryptocurrency can go.Feel free to check it out below and let me know your thoughts/suggestions.https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tzegian.cryptoanalogyScreenshots:

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: tzegian on March 04, 2023, 09:19:52 AMFeel free to check it out below and let me know your thoughts/suggestions.https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tzegian.cryptoanalogyIt looks promising, but here are a few notes:I noticed the data for Bitcoin only goes back to April of 2013, but there are a few sources out there that have data from August of 2011 [e.g. nomics].How short is the interval for fetching the data for the exchanges tab? Is it automated or we should refresh it in some way?It'd be better if users had the option to choose sources for the news tab.An alert feature would be nice as well.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: tzegian on March 04, 2023, 09:19:52 AMCrypto Analogy is here to assist you in finding the key coin stats, having the best coin tracker containing thousands of coins like Bitcoin, Ethereum and every other cryptocurrency, discovering various market stats and exploring the most important crypto news.Is Crypto Analogy app totally free or you have some paid features, and why releasing only version for android and not for iOS?I try to use mostly open source software and apps, so I would appreciate if you consider releasing your code on github for more transparency and for review.There are already several alternative apps that are open source and have many features like your app, and I really don't need to read crypto news in app.
